name: SCP Revisited
description:
SCP Revisited is a collection of most popular SCP games, all remade by me.

Currently available: SCP-087. More coming soon, such as 087-b-1. Any ideas for new SCPs are welcome on our Discord.

SCP-087 story description

You have been tasked with finding the remains of people who have went down the staircase and never came back. Also, you must find a certain undocumented artifact if you want to be let out.

SCP-087-1 coming soon

______

JOIN OUR DISCORD: Discord Invite

Current game version: 0.1
